thread.title: BRIEF-GE Says Co, Arenko Group Announce Strategic Alliance To Build Grid Scale Energy Storage Systems In UK

title: BRIEF-GE Says Co, Arenko Group Announce Strategic Alliance To Build Grid Scale Energy Storage Systems In UK

organizations.name: arenko group announce strategic alliance to build grid scale energy storage systems
build grid scale energy storage systems in uk reuters staff

text:
February 5, 2018 / 11:57 AM / in 2 minutes BRIEF-GE Says Co, Arenko Group Announce Strategic Alliance To Build Grid Scale Energy Storage Systems In UK Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
Feb 5 (Reuters) - General Electric Co: 
* GE SAYS CO, ARENKO GROUP ANNOUNCE STRATEGIC ALLIANCE TO BUILD GRID SCALE ENERGY STORAGE SYSTEMS IN THE UK 
* GE SAYS BATTERY STORAGE SYSTEM IS SITED AT A LOCATION IN MIDLANDS, WILL COMMENCE OPERATIONS IN 2018 
* GE SAYS ARENKO HAS INVESTED IN A 41MW BATTERY ENERGY STORAGE SYSTEM SUPPLIED BY GE, WHO IS PROVIDING A FULLY INTEGRATED BATTERY STORAGE SOLUTION Source text : ( bit.ly/2FLrVgs ) Further company coverage:
